availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Jordan D. Jones (Lyon County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Married to Mary Layton Jones in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on February 22, 1844. Father of James C. Jones, Sarah J. Jones, William R. Jones, Henry F. Jones, Charles W. Jones, George W. Jones, Mary C. Jones, and John L. Jones. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Lyon County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 1, p. 319A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, p. 674.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, District 1, p. 1A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994046, Lyon County Births.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film 000851644.
"Jordan D. Jones (Unknown-1880)," Find A Grave, Memorial 74752285, accessed January 25, 2023, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/74752285.
